This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.
If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`

Method: GET URL: http://127.0.0.1:8080/api/samples?name=LC400001 Headers: { "Connection": "keep-alive", "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_6) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) HeadlessChrome/85.0.4183.102 Safari/537.36", "accept": "*/*", "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate", "content-type": "application/json", "content-length": 29 } Body: {"Accept":"application/json"}
